/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. On the right side of the street, there's a large body of water, possibly a lake or a pond, reflecting the sky and adding depth to the image. The sky itself is a clear blue with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and the buildings in the background. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
